alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Houston; Jones; Monroe; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 06 at 8:57AM EST until January 07 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Houston, Monroe, Jones, Bibb and Twiggs Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Griffin, Juliette, Juliette, Macon, Dames Ferry, Macon, Byron, Hawkinsville, Hawkinsville, Clinchfield, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding will continue. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River near Macon. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20 feet, Minor flooding expands. An increasing amount of the Macon GreenWay Ocmulgee Heritage Trail floods north of the Martin Luther King Boulevard bridge. The flood waters will be around one foot deep on portions of the trail and both banks overflow upstream from the bridge. Large portions of agricultural lands well downstream will be under one to three feet of water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM EST Friday the stage was 20.1 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 12.7 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 18 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
